programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: The film depicts an unpredictable global cooperative investigation by South Korean, North Korean, and American detectives who have come together for their own purposes.

programme.title: Dragon Fist
programme.desc: A dishonored student of the Dragon Fist Sect seeks revenge for the death of his teacher.

programme.title: Acts Of Vengeance
programme.desc: A formerly fast-talking lawyer takes a vow of silence and trains himself to avenge the murder of his family

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: Desperate for revenge, a young man enlists the aid of a medium to help him track down his sister's killer.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A rock climber tries to to save the day when a mysterious white gas envelops an entire district in Seoul, South Korea.

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: A group of friends who ventures into the remote Texas woods for a party weekend finds themselves stalked by Bigfoot

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: A serial killer ruthlessly hunts down a deaf woman through the streets of South Korea after she witnesses his brutal crime.

programme.title: The Room
programme.desc: Matt and Kate buy an isolated house. While moving, they discover a strange room that grants them an unlimited number of material wishes. But since Kate has had two miscarriages, what they long for the most is a child.

programme.title: Death Forest 3 And Death Forest 4
programme.desc: Uchida Mayu is a high school student in a peaceful town near Tokyo. Meanwhile,, Mayu's uncle Uchida Kazuki is a freelancer writer, who chases after the hideous monster Yoshie who attacks people.

programme.title: At First Light
programme.desc: A high school senior has an encounter with mysterious lights over her small town and develops dangerous, supernatural abilities and turns to her childhood friend Sean Terrel.

programme.title: Cracked
programme.desc: Ruja inherited the painting from her deceased father and hired Tim, an art restorer to repair it, but they don't know that this invaluable art came with invaluable horror.

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed 4
programme.desc: An underground fighter fights brutal matches to protect the widow of a man he unintentionally killed in the ring.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: Manu is in India for the first time in his life and wants to discover as much food as he can handle. From an Idli making lesson to a workout in the flower markets of Kolkata. Will he make it to Hong Kong on time and in one piece?

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: Manu heads to Hong Kong, the fourth country on his around the world tour, and he has some great food excursions lined up. Chicken feet, Tim Ho Wan, street food and lots to fit in before he jumps across the pond to Tokyo, Japan.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: As Manu heads past his halfway mark on his journey around the world, he heads to Tokyo to explore the bustling city. It is a massive challenge and he is having the time of his life but how is that budget going?

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena restaurant-hops with friends Lilly Singh and Laura Marano, indulging in plant-based French pastries, "pastrami" sammies, Thai "chicken" wings and "carne" asada.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: A diverse group of chefs create mouth-watering plant-based dumplings, fried `chik'n' sandwiches and Vietnamese `catfish'; Mena forages for lobster mushrooms and visits the oldest tofu factory in America.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena explores his Canadian backyard, discovering delicious plant-based sushi, pistachio cannolis, and pizza; he gets hands-on at a vegan cheese factory with comedian Bassem Youssef.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: It is the home stretch with just one more country on Manu's list. America offers amazing food experiences on his final leg of his adventure. Around the world. Thirty days. $20,000 to spend. Will Manu achieve his dream?

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in his mum's home town of Beijing to begin a culinary, historical and personal journey through the ancient country of China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam visits the beautiful, mountainous province of Anhui, home to one of the eight great regional cuisines of China. Anhui cuisine is hearty, peasant food that uses seasonal, wild produce from the mountains.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam's journey to explore China's history through its food continues, as he visits the provinces of Jiangsu and Zhejiang, both considered part of the 8 great regional cuisines of China and celebrated for their wealth and sophistication.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the largest cities in the world Shanghai where he discovers a modern, cosmopolitan and global facing city.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: On his journey discovering China's history through its food, Adam arrives in Shandong - birthplace of Confucius and one of the oldest and most influential culinary traditions in China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the most fascinating Chinese provinces - Yunnan. Infused with spice and fragrance from Southeast and Central Asia, people from all around China have fallen in love with this cuisine and culture.

programme.title: Into the Cosmos: The Space Race, Mars And Beyond

programme.title: Armstrong

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: We follow two teams of dogs as they prepare for the toughest international sled dog races in the world. Labradors trained to detect fire ants in Australia and a new way to track ringed seals in the artic - dogs.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: We find out what goes on in the training of a 'general purpose dog' and how a English Springer Spaniel has the ability to sniff out one billionth of a gram of an explosive substance.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: In Malaysia, dogs are used to sniff out illegal DVDs while in UK, dogs are trained to search a fire scene and identify flammable liquids.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Italy's water resue dogs, New Zealand's search and rescue dogs and Australia's team of competitive Alaskan huskies.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: It’s Game Show Day in the dollhouse! They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. programme.title: Rare Survivors - China's Iconic Wildlife 1

From snow leopards to wild horses, and from alligators to elephants, China's iconic wildlife is a lot more than just pandas.

programme.title: Are You Human?
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead. There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: Military veteran Wu and undercover cop Ming rescue hostages on an island near Bangkok. When Wu discovers his daughter has also been captured, he stays with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: Iron Squad W

Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 20
programme.desc: Let the battle begin! Leonard, Sheldon and Raj fight for tenure at the University – and the competition heats up when the girls get involved!

programme.title: Er S1 13
programme.desc: Benton is called out of surgery to find his senile mother. Kayson formally charges Lewis with negligence in the death of a patient. Carter is forced to help Benton's new intern.

programme.title: Er S1 14
programme.desc: Lewis goes before the review board when a hostile attending doctor holds her responsible for a patient's death.

programme.title: The Enforcer
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood returns as Dirty Harry Callahan in this hard-edged thriller. San Francisco police inspector Harry Callahan is assigned a female partner (Tyne Daly), but he has little time to express his displeasure because terrorists kidnap the mayor. Now no holds are barred when Dirty Harry goes into action.

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: Lately, it seems Jimmy's only solace can be found at the bottom of a whiskey glass. But when Jimmy's estranged son, Mike (The Killing's Joel Kinnaman), becomes a target, Jimmy must make a choice between the crime family he chose and the real family he abandoned long ago. With Mike on the run, Jimmy's only penance for his past mistakes may be to keep his son from the same fate Jimmy is certain he'll face himself...at the wrong end of a gun. Now, with nowhere safe to turn, Jimmy just has one night to figure out exactly where his loyalties lie and to see if he can finally make things right.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 9
programme.desc: The CBI team investigates the murder of a real estate agent with former gang ties, while Jane searches for leads on his new connection to Red John.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 10
programme.desc: The death of a young botanist leads the CBI team into the lucrative world of medical marijuana, while reunites with former girlfriend and CI, Summer Edgecombe (SAMAIRE ARMSTRONG).

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batson’s (Asher Angel) case, by shouting out one word—SHAZAM!—this streetwise 14-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult Super Hero Shazam (Zachary Levi), courtesy of an ancient wizard (Djimon Hounsou). Still a kid at heart—inside a ripped, godlike body—Shazam revels in this adult version of himself by doing what any teen would do with superpowers: have fun with them! Can he fly? Does he have X-ray vision? Can he shoot lightning out of his hands? Can he skip his social studies test? Shazam sets out to test the limits of his abilities with the joyful recklessness of a child. But he’ll need to master these powers quickly in order to fight the deadly forces of evil controlled by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana (Mark Strong).

programme.title: Journey To The Center Of The Earth
programme.desc: During a scientific expedition to Iceland, scientist Trevor Anderson (Fraser-- Crash, The Mummy), his nephew Sean (Josh Hutcherson) and their local guide, Hannah (Anita Briem), are trapped in a cave -- from which their only escape is to go deeper, into unimagined worlds, where the trio comes face to face with never-before-seen creatures and harrowing dangers as they race an building volcanic eruption to reach the surface!

programme.title: Wrath Of The Titans
programme.desc: Taking place 10 years after his heroic defeat of the Kraken, Perseus (Sam Worthington) embarks on a treacherous quest into the underworld to rescue his father, overthrow the Titans and save mankind.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 21
programme.desc: After one of his favorite TV shows gets canceled too soon, Sheldon feels lost, so Amy tries to help him get over his compulsive need for closure.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 22
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon hire Professor Proton (guest star BOB NEWHART), the host of their favorite childhood TV show to perform. Raj leaves his dog with Howard and Bernadette.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 23
programme.desc: When the girls' trip to Vegas falls through, the guys invite them to a Dungeons & Dragons date night.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 24
programme.desc: On the sixth season finale, Sheldon and Penny are thrown for a loop when Leonard is offered an exciting new job opportunity overseas.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 13
programme.desc: The guys head to Orlando, where they are out of line with theme park guests, get wet on a river adventure and manage the (mis)information booth. Plus, the loser goes from spider hero to barnyard zero.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 14
programme.desc: Sal, Murr, Joe and Q say aloha in a fun Hawaiian episode! The future looks hazy when the guys pose as fortune tellers and practice indecent proposals at a romantic waterfall. Plus, it's blood in the water for the big loser.

programme.title: Friends S5 15
programme.desc: Chandler thinks Monica wants more from their relationship. Ross fails to impress his new neighbors.

programme.title: Friends S5 16
programme.desc: After Phoebe finds a police badge, she uses it to do good deeds. Joey worries that he is in love with Monica.

programme.title: Friends S5 17
programme.desc: Rachel interviews for a great job but she may get it for the wrong reason. Monica competes to have a better relationship than Phoebe's.

programme.title: Friends S5 18
programme.desc: Rachel starts smoking when she realizes that her boss and co-workers at her new job are smokers. Monica and Phoebe plan a surprise birthday party for Rachel. Joey and Ben audition for a commercial.

programme.title: Friends S5 19
programme.desc: Ross' flirting technique fails to impress a pizza-delivery woman. A surprise awaits Joey when he tells everyone about his big television appearance.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 01
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin return with an explosion of brand new hacks! Tonight, they cook lasagna in a dishwasher, go back in time to discover some of history's earliest hacks, and learn how to hack breakfast using power tools.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 02
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin find out if an electrocuted hot dog is hack or wack, welcome socks to the all-star club, and learn how a bra is really a hack from history. And there's a new doctor in town with his own hacks to save the day.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 03
programme.desc: Our dynamic duo discovers how to hack vodka to taste like top shelf, explores the origin of gin and tonic with Hacks from History, and welcomes a tennis ball into the exclusive All Star club.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 04
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke host the ultimate Battle of the Bags by discovering the best hacks for carrying groceries. Plus, they welcome rubber gloves to the All Star Club and explore hacks from the original Hack Master: Benjamin Franklin.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 13
programme.desc: The guys head to Orlando, where they are out of line with theme park guests, get wet on a river adventure and manage the (mis)information booth. Plus, the loser goes from spider hero to barnyard zero.

programme.title: Cody's Great Day Out!
programme.desc: Join Cody for a great day out! He rides the bus, goes on a dino safari & celebrates his birthday at Dinoland.

programme.title: Fun Adventures!
programme.desc: Join the trucks for a day of fun & games! From playing with a new bouncy castle to a snowy adventure, every day is an exciting journey.

programme.title: All About Baby Bus!
programme.desc: Follow Baby Bus on her first day of adventures! She’s learning the ropes at Gecko's Garage & discovering what makes her special.

programme.title: Gecko Has Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: When Gecko needs a hand, his fantastic friends are always there to help him, showing the true power of teamwork & friendship.

programme.title: The Earth Is Amazing!
programme.desc: The Earth is our home, & it's amazing! Baby John explores the wonders of nature & learns how important it is to help keep our planet clean.

programme.title: Outdoor Fun!
programme.desc: It's time for some outdoor fun! The family has a movie night in the backyard, goes camping at the Grand Canyon & has a fun day at the beach.

programme.title: Be Like Daddy!
programme.desc: Daddy is Baby John's hero! Follow Baby John as he spends the day trying to be just like his amazing dad, from fixing things to being strong & kind.

programme.title: Sing Your Heart Out With Mia!
programme.desc: Sing your heart out with Mia! She bakes a cake, drives her car in the rain & learns about opposites with her friend Maple.

programme.title: Nursery Rhyme, Fun Time
programme.desc: It's a nursery rhyme fun time! The friends row their boats, hop with the bunnies & play "Ring-A-Ring O' Roses" in the garden.

programme.title: Mia's Spectaclar Sing Along!
programme.desc: It's Mia's spectacular sing-along! She sees five little speckled frogs, washes a muddy bus & goes on a train ride with her friends.

programme.title: Be Kind JJ!
programme.desc: Let’s learn how to be a good friend. In this story, JJ discovers the importance of sharing his toys & being kind to everyone.

programme.title: Sing Along and Dance WIth JJ!
programme.desc: Sing along & dance with JJ! Get excited for the recycling truck, take a trip to the train park & learn your ASL ABCs with Miss Appleberry.

programme.title: Sing Along With Cody!
programme.desc: Sing along with Cody! He moves to a new house, feels better after having a bad dream & learns that saying "goodbye" isn't forever.

programme.title: Magical Adventures
programme.desc: Go on magical adventures with Buster! He escapes an erupting volcano, uses a magic spellbook & becomes a superhero to save the day.

programme.title: Buster Loves His Mommy!
programme.desc: Buster loves his Mommy! They spend the day painting & playing together & when Buster smashes a flowerpot, his mommy comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Buster Has a Wobbly Tooth!
programme.desc: Buster has a wobbly tooth! He gets it after being hit with a football & he & his friends race to the dentist.

programme.title: It's Time To Sing Along
programme.desc: Get ready to sing! This is a non-stop musical party, as Baby John & his family turn every moment of their day into a joyful song.

programme.title: Love Your Family
programme.desc: It’s all about family! Join Baby John as he spends a wonderful day singing about his love & appreciation for his mommy, daddy, & siblings.

programme.title: A Day Out With Family
programme.desc: It’s a perfect day for a family outing! Join Baby John & his family as they go on a special trip to the park for a picnic & fun games.

programme.title: A Day With Mila!
programme.desc: Join Mila for a day of amazing adventures where her magic pet, Morphle, transforms into anything she needs to help friends & solve problems.

programme.title: Cop Car Caper
programme.desc: Officer Morphle is on the case! He must stop a series of troublemakers, including a giant baby, a runaway globe, & a group of pesky bandits.

programme.title: Barky Walkies
programme.desc: A city-wide search for the Mayor's lost dog, Barky, gets complicated when Morphle & Mila must also stop the mischievous Bandits along the way.

programme.title: Amazing Adventures!
programme.desc: It's time for amazing adventures! Tilly the tow truck gets sick, Weasel causes a cake catastrophe & Blue Mechanical gets lost.

programme.title: Thankful Pie
programme.desc: The team bakes a thankful pie for Grandma! They also have to catch a runaway tire, rescue a boat with a tow rope & play a game of football.

programme.title: A Great Day at the Garage!
programme.desc: It’s a busy day at the garage! From messy cement mixers to trucks with flat tires, Gecko has his hands full fixing his friends.

programme.title: Quiet Time
programme.desc: It's time for quiet time. Baby John learns about the skeleton in his body, the family sleeps in one big bed & they all go on an adventure to the moon.

programme.title: Bedtime Songs With JJ
programme.desc: The sun is setting, & it’s time for bed. Follow JJ’s calming evening routine as he gets ready to drift off to sleep.

programme.title: Sing Along With Cody!
programme.desc: Sing along with Cody! He moves to a new house, feels better after having a bad dream & learns that saying "goodbye" isn't forever.

programme.title: Sing Along With JJ and Friends!
programme.desc: Sing along with JJ & friends! Build a giant pillow fort, go on a camper van vacation & learn how to make the perfect PB&J sandwich.

programme.title: Dance To Your Favourite Songs
programme.desc: It's time to dance to your favorite songs! Do the silly animal dance, dance like a ballerina & see a cow jump over the moon.

programme.title: Singing Fun
programme.desc: It's time for singing fun! Learn about sneezing, do the "Looby Loo," & play some silly April Fool's jokes.

programme.title: Amazing Animals
programme.desc: It’s a wild adventure with Baby John! He's visiting the farm & the zoo to meet & learn about all sorts of amazing animals.

programme.title: Time To Play
programme.desc: It's time to play! The friends have fun at an indoor playground, Jill has her first parade & the family plays with colorful balloons.

programme.title: Vehicles and Animals
programme.desc: It's a day of vehicles & animals! Max gets a DIY fire engine, the family rides the big red bus & mealtime is fun with pretend animal sounds.

programme.title: Shake Your Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Let's shake your little baby bum! The friends have a dance party, learn a calming breathing song & play in the sandpit.

programme.title: Get Ready to Sing Along
programme.desc: Get ready to sing along! Miss Polly's dolly is sick, the family goes on a sleepy bus ride & the friends make their own instruments.

programme.title: JJ's Magical Carousel Ride!
programme.desc: Go on a magical carousel ride with JJ! Become a brave knight, blast off in a rocketship & solve the mystery of who took the cookie.

programme.title: JJ is Having a Dance Party!
programme.desc: JJ is having a dance party! Count down with five little dinosaurs, visit a pumpkin patch & sing "Happy & You Know It" in Italian.

programme.title: Fun Vehicles With JJ!
programme.desc: Let's go for a ride! Join JJ as he learns about the big wheels on the bus & explores all sorts of other amazing vehicles.

programme.title: Baby Chaos
programme.desc: Arpo is on baby duty, but this is no ordinary baby! From super-strength to unexpected transformations, Arpo has his hands full keeping the baby safe.

programme.title: Adventures With ARPO
programme.desc: Arpo's adventures take him from the backyard to the far reaches of his imagination, facing everything from aliens to giant vegetables.

programme.title: ARPO Has a Crazy Day
programme.desc: Arpo's day is a whirlwind of crazy challenges, from runaway ice cream trucks to mischievous baby antics.

programme.title: Exercise Is Fun!
programme.desc: Let's get moving! Baby John discovers how fun exercise can be through a series of energetic games, dances, & outdoor activities.

programme.title: Playtime
programme.desc: It’s time to play! Baby John is having a fun-filled day at the playground, where he learns how to share, take turns, & make new friends.

programme.title: Let's Do What the Animals Do!
programme.desc: Let's do what the animals do! The kids pretend to be their favorite animals, learn about opposites at the zoo & get a new pet chameleon.

programme.title: Clawed Away
programme.desc: Mysterious flying objects cause chaos! Mila & Morphle must stop a UFO with a giant claw while also dealing with Orphle's troublesome magic cloud.

programme.title: Baby Morphles!
programme.desc: A day of helping babies gets chaotic when Mila & Morphle must catch a runaway carriage & also manage a whole group of mischievous baby Morphles.

programme.title: Grow Your Own Veggies
programme.desc: Mila & Morphle's day of gardening & baking is thrown into chaos by magic seeds & Orphle's out-of-control construction digger.

programme.title: If You're Happy Sing Along
programme.desc: If you're happy, sing along! Join in with "Little Bunny Foo Foo," sing about the animals on Old MacDonald's farm & play with five little animals.

programme.title: ABC's and Counting With JJ
programme.desc: Learning is an adventure! Sing your way through the alphabet with JJ, & then count to ten with some very friendly dinosaurs.

programme.title: Fun times with JJ!
programme.desc: It's a playdate with JJ! Join him for a day of classic games & songs.

programme.title: The Observers
programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: Local police receive a distressing 911 call from 32-year-old Brian Redding. He is heard crying and screaming that he has found his 16-year-old girlfriend dead in their room.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When mother of two, Deanna Cook, missed her daily call to her mom, her family began to worry Deanna's 'stalker' might be involved. After texting and calling Deanna, her family called 911.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: In Modesto, a woman is brought in for her 14th felony charge, while a young man is arrested after not having reflectors on his bicycle. A man dances his way to the drunk tank.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: In 1991 Curtis "Cochise" Smith, 29, heads out for diapers in Plaquemine, Louisiana, and vanishes. Twenty-five years later, a body surfaces in the bayou, and Cochise's murder case reignites.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: Charlotte Murray Pace, an LSU graduate, is found raped and stabbed to death in her home. The brutality of the crime scene reminds police of the unsolved case of Gina Wilson Green.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West
programme.desc: When a mystery woman's burning body is found in an oil field in 2006, the rural community of Kilgore and a determined Texas lawman show why you don't mess with the Lone Star State.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: On his last day as an undercover agent, Bergen County Detective Carlos James experiences his first shootout, and ATF Agent Jenn Eskew poses as a hitwoman to investigate a possible murder for hire.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: The husband and father of a murdered family attacks their killer in court; a judge has no patience for a foul-mouthed defendant; a convicted drunk driver begs the judge for mercy; and more.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: After a young woman is found dead in her bathtub, the investigation focuses in on her estranged husband and her boyfriend. An unexpected digital clue has one of them confessing to the murder.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Social media influencer Alexis Murphy was on her way to a hair appointment, but never arrived. When a photo of her abandoned car was posted online, her worried loved-ones knew something was terribly wrong.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: Kerry Lyn Dalton was sentenced to death for the torture and murder of Irene "Melanie" May. And because Melanie was a meth addict with no fixed address, police did little to investigate her disappearance.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Elizabeth Thomas Story with Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: Five years after she was groomed and abducted by the most popular teacher in school, Elizabeth Thomas shares new revelations about her ordeal, with famed kidnapping survivor Elizabeth Smart.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A boater goes off the deep end; a naked man causes traffic chaos; a police uniform-swiper gets taken to the cleaners; and more!

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: A handcuffed defendant attacks her lawyer; a sex offender's mom takes offense at his bail hearing; a judge dresses down a panty thief; and more.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Five women share their harrowing accounts of abduction and imprisonment. They discuss what happens when the news coverage dies down and how they've healed from the trauma they experienced.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S6)
programme.desc: A young father and his family come under attack at a busy drive-thru. Terrified of his aggravated assailant, he fires his gun and allegedly injures an innocent bystander.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's disappearance shook a small town, and skull fractures point to murder.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: A Mobile mother goes missing after blowing millions at the casino. At trial, the DA and detective take a gamble of their own to bring her killer to justice.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When an up-and-coming defense attorney is murdered in her office, her colleagues vow to seek justice and "make this right."

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Matutong unawain ang kuwento ng pinagmulan ng sariling komunidad batay sa konsepto ng pagbabago at pagpapatuloy upang mapahalagahan ang kulturang nabuo ng komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano gumamit ng magagalang na pananalita, salitang naglalarawan, at angkop na tanong. Alamin rin ang mga salitang magkatugma, pagkukumpara ng kuwento at pagbibigay ng wakas dito.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: Learn multiplication and division of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: Know more about verbs, pronouns, consonant blends, and digraphs, as well as different sources of information and how to identify facts and opinions.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Matutong unawain at pahalagahan ang iba’t ibang kwento at mga sagisag na naglalarawan ng sariling lalawigan at mga karatig lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: Discover the parts and functions of the sense organs of the human body; parts and functions of animals and plants and their importance to humans; the characteristics of living and nonliving things and the basic needs of plants, animals and humans.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Aralin ang wastong pagbabaybay, paggamit ng mga bantas. Alamin rin kung ano ang pandiwa at pang-uri, at kung paano sumuri ng dokyumentaryo, talaarawan at talambuhay.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: Learn about decimals and the four fundamental operations involving decimals, ratio, and proportion.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: Identify aspects of verbs, modal, conjunctions and point of views.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Unawain ang konteksto sa bahaging ginampanan ng simbahan sa layunin at mga paraan ng pananakopng Espanyol sa Pilipinas at ang epekto ng mga ito sa lipunan.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: Learn how the parts of the human reproductive system work and how animals and plants reproduce, as well as the interactions for survival among living and nonliving things that take place in estuaries and intertidal zones.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin ang mga antas ng wika at mga salitang may kinalaman sa paghahambing, pati na rin ang pagsusulat at pagsusuri ng awitin at editoryal na sulatin.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: Learn about key concepts of measurement, algebraic expressions, the properties of real numbers as applied in linear equations, and inequalities in one variable.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: Know more about listening strategies, navigating websites, and using search engines, as well as summarizing key information, doing research, using analogy, and transcoding information.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Aralin ang kaisipang Asyano, pilosopiya, at relihiyon na nagbigay daan sa paghubog ng sinaunang kabihasnan sa Asya at sa pagbuo ng pagkakakilanlang Asyano.

programme.title: Grade 7 Science
programme.desc: Differentiate the parts and functions of the compound microscope and the different levels of biological organization, alongside the comparison between animal and plant cells, reproduction, and interaction between organisms.

programme.title: Grade 9 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa mga iba't ibang sulatin tulad ng tanka, haiku, sanaysay, at kung paano sumulat ng akda tungkol sa kulturang Asyano.

programme.title: Grade 9 Math
programme.desc: Identify the key concepts of variation and radicals.

programme.title: Grade 9 English
programme.desc: Observe how to coect and analyze texts and literature to real life.

programme.title: Grade 9 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Aralin ang pangunahing kaalaman sa ugnayan ng pwersa ng demand at suplay, at sa sistema ng pamilihan bilang batayan ng matalinong pagdedesisyon ng sambahayan at bahay- kalakal tungo sa pambansang kaunlaran.

programme.title: Grade 9 Science
programme.desc: Learn about the development of atomic models, how atoms combine with other atoms, forces that hold metals together, and the type of bonds that carbon forms.

programme.title: Grades 11 and 12 TLE
programme.desc: Ang palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kasanayan sa tech-voc at negosyong pangkabuhayan na may layong makatulong sa mga guro at mag-aaral ng Technical and Vocational Education (TECH-VOC).

programme.title: Grades 11 and 12 TLE
programme.desc: AgriKids is a video lesson series which aims to raise agriculture literacy in young learners and make them understand how important it is in their daily lives. The video series talks about agricultural concepts, ideas, and principles such as planting, farming, and harvesting.

programme.title: MAPEH
programme.desc: A fun and creative art show that teaches kids how to make simple yet impressive “masterpieces” using basic materials and a lot of imagination.

programme.title: MAPEH
programme.desc: VeggiEskwela is an online webinar series that promotes the appreciation, production, and consumption of vegetables for a healthy lifestyle and food security, targeting students, teachers, parents, and the community.

programme.title: Wow
programme.desc: Explore how different towns and provinces thrive culturally, socially, and economically. This series nurtures a deeper appreciation of Filipino heritage for fellow Filipinos.

programme.title: Parent-Teacher Activity Time
programme.desc: A helpful guide for parents and teachers, this program features essential topics to better support children in the distance learning setup.

programme.title: Dokyumento
programme.desc: A showcase of powerful and eye-opening documentaries from various regions in the Philippines. It features real stories, relevant issues, and inspiring journeys which spotlights Filipino voices, culture, and experiences.

programme.title: Early Childhood Development for Parents and Teachers
programme.desc: Learn about letters, body parts and their uses, and objects in the environment with their properties.

programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pabula at alamat at ang pagkasunod-sunod ng mga pangyayari nito. Alamin rin ang wastong paggamit ng magagalang na pananalita, pangngalan, malalaki at maliliit na letra, pati na rin ang pagbasa at pagbilang ng mga pantig.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe bring Chloe on an undercover mission to Secret Shores so she can experience life as a normal kid. When a new supervillain threat emerges, the trio must stay in town longer than they anticipated.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When Danger Force and Captain Man are called to Paris to protect France's national treasures, Bose is accidentally left alone to try and stop The Toddler from breaking into The Man's Nest.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Piper's basketball coach quits, Henry becomes the coach of Piper's team. As he tries to whip the team into shape, he is challenged by the League Board and its unorthodox rules.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The mutant seahorse called MUSTANG SALLY is going to flood the city... and the only thing standing in his way are LEO and Pigeon Pete. Being the leader isn't all it's cracked up to be.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jack's new friend Beef invites him to a sleepover. Jack, a sleepover newb, freaks out over impressing his new friend. // Jack & Lil try to prove they're the one true local, enduring a series of bizarre quests in the local dive restaurant Dead Ed's.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Will & Min show Jack around to help him find a good story. Lily spills boba in Jack's suitcase and tries to hide the evidence.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When a storm sweeps the Krusty Krab away, its crew and customers will need a crazed Krabs to lead them back home. // Patrick’s last baby tooth needs to come out, but he’s afraid to let it go.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When SpongeBob thinks he's allergic to his pineapple, Squidward offers to help find him a new home. // Squidward is getting a nose job at the local hospital, and SpongeBob tags along as moral support.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns that "imitation is the sincerest form of flattery" - too bad no one told him how to stop! // When worms move in to SpongeBob's holes, it's up to him to hide his disgusting new friends from everyone else.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: When Granny Tentacles goes out for a spa day, Patrick and Squidina take care of her house. // After Plankton forgets who he is, the Dartfish family adopts him.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try to get Yoon Kwan's autograph and Carlota helps Alisa prepare for the Great Lakes City Music Festival!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Abuela teaches Ronnie Anne that getting ingredients for dinner is no small task. // When Vito's apartment floods, the kids try to find an apartment that suits him best.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Adelaide and Carl have an adventure on Mr. Chang's route, but can they work together to save the day? // When Mama Lupe comes to visit, Abuela tries to get her family at the top of their cultural game.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton tells Patrick he's his conscience so he can convince the wooden-headed star to steal him a Krabby Patty. // When Mr. Krabs puts in an open kitchen, SpongeBob gets stage fright and has to invent a new persona.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton hasn't tried to steal the secret formula in a while...and that's making Mr. Krabs nervous! // When Patrick discovers the pineapple's library, SpongeBob introduces him to the wonderful world of book learning!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob visits his old pal Bubble Buddy's hometown... Bubbletown! // Sandy invites Karen and Mrs. Puff out for a night on the town, so the ladies decide to blow off some steam.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel tries to make Pudding Day at school fair for everyone, she accidentally starts a pudding apocalypse. // When Hazel wishes her hair had "spirit" for a school contest, she finds it has more personality than she bargained for!
